name: Fairy Forest (Liang920)
description:
Fairy Forest is a short rpg pixel game and made with unity.  It is made in about 2 weeks. The play time is about 15~30 minutes.

Only one end has been made so far, but it is assumed that another story will be told in the new game plus (second round), which is the prequel story of this game.

All music in this game used by free music material. The graphic part, programming and story parts are produced by individuals.

Languages are available in Chinese, English and Japanese.
